array.string: Oh look, it's a new face. I haven't seen you down here before. My name is Whalezart and this is where I live. It's called the Tiny Barrier Reef.
Do you see those pretty rocks? Those are called coral. It's a very colorful place, but sometimes it gets too quiet.
Wait, you're not from the sea, are you? Oh! I can see your fingers! I only have flippers. That means you can help us make some music.
The sea is always singing, we just have to be clever enough to hear it. I think it’s all in the bubbles.
If you see any bubbles floating up, make sure you pop them. But you have to pop them in the right order, otherwise it won’t sound very good.
My friends, The Clams, heard you were visiting, and they wanted to come out and play too!
They’re really good at making music, but they don’t know how to work together. It’s up to you to help.
What ever color bubble you see, you have to touch the clam that has that color, so if you see a red bubble, touch the red clam! But you can’t be too slow, otherwise the bubbles will float away.
Hello, it’s me, Whalezart.
Hi, remember me, Whalezart?
It is I, Whalezart! Whale composer extraordinaire.
Ok, here goes nothing. Get ready!
On your mark, get set, go!
Ears perked, fingers forward. Are you ready?
Oh, I can't wait to hear you play. Here we go!
Oh no, that's not right. Try again.
No, I don't think that's correct.
That sounds weird. Why don't you try again?
That sounded great, I knew you could do it!
That was music to my ears! Good job!
Hmm… I think you need more practice. Remember, practice makes perfect.
You’ll do better next time, I know it. Just remember to practice.
This is the score screen. It tells you how well you did. You can even see how many notes you missed. If you played well enough, you’ll earn a badge for each difficulty.
There's always music around us, you just have to know where to find it.
Have you been to the Great Barrier Reef? I heard it’s almost as nice as this.
Did you know some whales, such as humpback whales, can sing too?
Oh, I see you this is your first time playing this mode. Do you want to have a lesson first? I can teach you how to read musical notation.
